Title: Framework agreement procedure first stage
Description: This contracting process follows on from the related process to establish a framework. The suppliers on the framework are listed in the award section of the related process.

Title: Planning process
Description: This contracting process follows on from the related planning process.

Title: Parent contract (for sub-contracts)
Description: This contracting process might result in a sub-contract of the related process.

Title: Prior process
Description: This contracting process follows on from the related successful process.

Title: Prior process (replacement)
Description: This contracting process is the replacment of the related process.

Title: Prior process (renewal)
Description: This contracting process is the renewal of the related process.

Title: Prior process (additional)
Description: This contracting process is for the purchase of additional goods, services or works related to the goods, services or works purchased from the same supplier in the related process.

Title: Prior process (repetition)
Description: This contracting process is for the purchase of new goods, services or works that consitute a repetition of the goods, services or works purchased from the same supplier in the related process.

Title: Unsuccessful process
Description: This contracting process follows on from a previous unsuccessful process.
